isString: The value must be a string
isNumber: The value must be a number
isInt: The value must be an integer
isBoolean: The value must be a boolean
isDate: The value must be a valid date
isEmail: The value must be a valid email address
isArray: The value must be an array
length: The value must be exactly {{constraints.0}} characters long
minLength: The value must be at least {{constraints.0}} characters long
maxLength: The value must not exceed {{constraints.0}} characters
isIn: The value must be one of the following: {{values}}
isUUID: The value must be a valid UUID
isUrl: The value must be a valid URL
matches: The value does not match the required pattern
isPositive: The value must be a positive number
isNegative: The value must be a negative number
